name: 3D FPS (Bluestone33105)
description:
This is my game. Yay! its late, I know, I had to reset the due date. But thats because of my hay baling season coming in, and i didn't get to put in nearly as much work as I wanted. Hope there are no major issues!

My Changes:

Made a (kinda) new gun for level 2

Added a few models from blender, no time for any fancy things, just a few 30 second things

Level 3 has a floor that kills you.

Ummmmmmmm . . . Level 4 has a door that needs two keys, but i think that doesn't count because I just copy/pasted the door with the same location and rotation values.

I added a variable into the player controller so now I can let the player have any number of "double" jumps as I want. . . but I didn't use it.

I only have them in level one, but i have destructible cacti! shoot them, and they break, along with any segments above it.

I added a slightly glitchy enemy in level 2 with a key embedded in its back that gives you the key if you kill it.

I upgraded the boss to shoot blue, more powerful bullets now that deal 2 damage per hit.
